overview: Combining a concert film with a making-of documentary, this presentation provides a dramatization of Franz Schubert's famed song cycle along with a unique look at the collaborative process in bringing the production to the screen. Tenor Ian Bostridge vocalizes the part of the wanderer from Wilhelm MÃ¼ller's poems (on which the cycle is based), with Julius Drake accompanying him on piano and David Alden directing.
title: Winterreise
